data.actual_result: It's colour almost completely matches with it's surroundings.
data.expected_result: It is in a colour that can be seen on light theme.
data.short_description: The prune text in the prune members modal is almost completely invisible on light theme when you have nobody to prune. Android lollipop specific.[Android 5.0 specific]
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to light theme.  - Give everyone a role in your server. - Open server settings> Members. - From the 3 dots, click on prune members. - Look at the prune button in the modal.
